column2: "Forces have a big bag of tricks: attack, recovery, and support. We have it all."
"That's why Forces must pay attention to what others are doing. Only then can we perform the right action at the right time."
"It's not easy during fast-paced combat, but paying attention separates the wheat from the chaff."
"So here's my idea. Let's see if you can learn how it's done on the \"Floating Continent Probe\" quest."
